subject: 🏦 Boost Your Cash Flow Without Adding Debt
body:
Hi {name},

Struggling with cash flow gaps between delivering your service and getting paid? You're not alone.

At Doriscar Capital Group, we offer solutions like accounts receivable financing and purchase order funding to help you access working capital **without new debt**.

✅ Stay current on payroll
✅ Take on larger projects
✅ Improve vendor relationships

Ready to solve your cash flow puzzle?

👉 Schedule a call with our CEO and founder Dr. David Doriscar today:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min

subject: 💡 Don’t Let Outstanding Invoices Hold You Back
body:
Hi {name},

Did you know that your unpaid invoices can unlock immediate capital?

Our invoice financing solutions convert your accounts receivables into **cash today** — so you can operate freely, take on more clients, or cover expenses without waiting 30, 60, or even 90 days.

We’re helping business owners just like you **break free from cash flow bottlenecks.**

👉 Book your call with Dr. David Doriscar and explore your options:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min

subject: 🚀 Scale Faster with Purchase Order Financing
body:
Hi {name},

Do you have more orders than cash to fulfill them? That’s actually a good problem — and we know how to solve it.

Purchase Order (PO) financing allows you to accept big orders with confidence by using **our capital** to pay your suppliers.

✅ No missed opportunities
✅ No upfront costs
✅ No dilution of ownership

If you're ready to take your business to the next level without stretching your budget…

👉 Schedule a strategy session with our CEO, Dr. David Doriscar:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min

subject: 📊 Master Your Cash Flow for Long-Term Success
body:
Hi {name},

Strong cash flow isn’t just about today — it's about building resilience and predictability into your business.

We’ll walk you through:
- Your working capital options
- How to create a cash flow buffer
- Strategies to avoid seasonal slowdowns

Let’s build a funding strategy around your goals.

👉 Book a 1-on-1 session with Dr. David Doriscar:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min
